title: Addendum-erratum to: ``Nonasymptotic critical behavior from field theory at d=3. II. The ordered-phase case. Phys. Rev. B35, 3585 (1987)
abstract: This note is intended to emphasize the existence of estimated Feynman integrals in three dimensions for the free energy of the O(1) scalar theory up to five loops which may be useful for other work. We also correct some misprints of the published paper.
